vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in IPerpsV2Market.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.5.16 (IPerpsV2Market.sol#3): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: SOLIDITY_SHOULD_RETURN_STRUCT
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function assetPrice() external view returns (uint price, bool invalid);

vulnerability_findings.name: SOLIDITY_SHOULD_RETURN_STRUCT
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: function marketSizes() external view returns (uint long, uint short);
